html: 12.27.18  7:20 pm   In "Just Did a Bad Thing," around 0:30, you hit into a groove that I just can't get enough of. Seriously. Part of me wishes the song would continue longer with that groove. It feels a little different than some of your other releases. Less free jazz, more rock-like. Is this your music evolving, or are you just trying different things?

      do you recommend learning scales and things like that?

12.27.18  5:30 pm   In your new song, you use "as long as you believe in me," is this a reference to "Maybe I could eat Blades Of Grass."

12.27.18  5:18 pm   what do you think about the argument that people make that some of the Pop songs are "repetitive" and have "the same chords" and have "the same chord progressions" and that the chords are "too simplistic".

I don't think I agree with that.

What do you think?
